name: South Park Studios
overview:
South Park Studios, a joint venture between South Park creators Matt Stone and Trey Parker and Comedy Central, allows fans of South Park to stream any episode of the popular television series.

Revenues from the joint venture are being split 50/50 between Comedy Central and Stone/Parker.
